thread.title: Two lanes of southbound traffic reintroduced at Town Quay | Channel
thread.title_full: Two lanes of southbound traffic reintroduced at Town Quay | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Two lanes of southbound traffic reintroduced at Town Quay | Channel
text:
Guernsey's town Quay has re-opened two lanes of southbound traffic.
The lanes are between Crown Pier and Albert Square.
It means people heading south from the North Beach roundabout can now use the outside and inside lanes along North Esplande and Town Quay.
It comes after more than two weeks of works to reintroduce two lanes after the Environment Department agreed to revert back to the old system in July.
Last updated Fri 28 Aug 2015 Travel Guernsey
